system.effect: The fury of the attack forces the target to the ground, helplessly covering his face and keening in agony. The target is knocked Prone and must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or catch fire. The target must also make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Body (Severity 5)

The fury of the attack forces the target to the ground, helplessly covering his face and keening in agony. The target is knocked Prone and must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or catch fire. The target must also make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round.
